item.title: Hot meme coins are experiencing mixed movements, with OKB down 2.31% in the past hour and BIO up 13.68% in the past hour.
item.description: On August 22nd, based on market information, following Powell's dovish statements, Bitcoin and Ethereum witnessed a short-term breakthrough and a surge. However, recently, among the strong altcoins, there have been mixed gains and losses, and they have not shown a corresponding surge in Bitcoin and Ethereum. Among them:In the past 1 hour, OKB fell by 2.31% and is now trading at $213.63;In the past 1 hour, SOL rose by 4.07% and is now trading at $188.66;In the past 1 hour, BIO rose by 13.68% and is now trading at $0.2326.

item.title: US Stock Crypto Concept Stocks Soar, SBET Up Over 10%
item.description: On August 22nd, US stock crypto concept stocks witnessed a general increase. Crypto-focused companies such as:- Circle rose by 5.08%.- Riot Platforms rose by 4.93%.- Coinbase rose by 4.5%.- Strategy rose by 3%.Regarding treasury strategy companies:- SBET rose by 10.04%.- ALTS rose by 10.24%.- BMNR rose by 6.29%.

item.title: 「$125,000 Leveraged Long Position on ETH Liquidated」 Whale Long Position's Unrealized Gains Increase to $3.01 Million
item.description: On August 22nd, as per on-chain analyst Ai (@ai_9684xtpa), following Powell's dovish speech, the unrealized gains of the "125k USD ETH Long Liquidation" whale's long position rose to 3.01 million USD.

item.title: Ethereum Surges Above $4600 Temporarily, With Nearly 7.62% Gain in the Last Hour
item.description: On August 22nd, according to HTX market data, Ethereum briefly exceeded $4600. It is currently trading at $4618, with a nearly 7.62% increase in the past hour.

item.title: Trump: Will Dismiss Fed Board Chair Cook if She Does Not Resign
item.description: August 22nd, Trump: If Fed Governor Powell does not tender his resignation, I will dismiss him. (Xinhua News Agency)

item.title: In the last hour, a total of $128 million has been liquidated across the network, with the main position being a short liquidation.
item.description: On August 22nd, according to data from Coinglass, nearly $128 million was liquidated within one hour, with $119 million in short positions being liquidated.

item.title: Mainstream Cryptocurrencies Continue to Surge, Bitcoin Breaks $115,000, Ethereum Breaks $4,500
item.description: On August 22nd, according to HTX market data, mainstream cryptocurrencies continued to surge following Powell's dovish remarks. Bitcoin briefly exceeded $115,000 and is currently trading at $114,771, with a nearly 2.05% increase in the past hour. Ethereum briefly exceeded $4,500 and is currently trading at $4,482.21, with a nearly 4.6% increase in the past hour.

item.title: Yi Li Hua: ETH Ends Week-Long Bear Market, Gearing Up for Next Bull Run
item.description: On August 22nd, the founder of Liquid Capital (formerly LD Capital), Li Hua, published an article on Platform X, stating: "ETH has concluded a one-week bear market, which is in line with our expectation of a confirmed rate cut. Those who heeded the advice and bought at the dip, raise your hands. Let's jointly welcome the new round of growth."

item.title: Analysis: Powell "Joins" Dovish Camp, States Economic Risks Provide Greater Rationale for Rate Cut
item.description: August 22nd. Federal Reserve Chairman Powell expressed that the continuously "evolving" economic risks have provided the Fed with a more solid foundation for cutting interest rates. This assertion indicates that Powell has joined the "dovish" camp within the Federal Open Market Committee responsible for setting rates and signals his potential endorsement for a 25-basis-point rate cut at the Fed's next meeting in September. Although Powell acknowledged that the impact of the government's trade war on consumer prices is now "apparently visible," he suggested that this impact is unlikely to endure and may instead be a one-time shock that the central bank can disregard.He stated: "Given that the labor market is not overly tight and is facing increasing downside risks, this outcome does not seem probable." He further added, "Inflation is facing upside risks, while employment is facing downside risks, presenting a challenging situation." (ChainDD)

item.title: Powell: No Need to Tighten Policy Above Sustainable Employment Level, New Framework Aims to Adapt to Various Economic Conditions
item.description: On August 22nd, Federal Reserve Chairman Powell stated that the Fed still holds the view that relying solely on employment being above its maximum sustainable level is an uncertain estimate and may not necessarily call for policy tightening. If a tight labor market poses risks to price stability, proactive measures may be needed. The previous framework placed excessive emphasis on specific economic conditions, which may have caused some confusion; the new framework is intended to adapt to various economic situations.
